nodes.name: Top Right Door Spawn At Junction

strats.name: Leave With Runway (Pirates Alive)
strats.note: Stun the bottom Pirate by shooting it.

strats.name: Leave With Runway (Screw Attack Pirate Kill)
Leave With Runway (PB Periphery Pirate Kill)
note: The Power Bombs must be placed carefully to hit the Pirate without destroying the PB blocks.
This strat requires heatproof because it's pretty chaotic to execute.

strats.name: Quick Walljump
strats.note: Walljump from directly above the door to avoid the left wall pirate.

strats.name: Avoid Pirates
note: Shoot the standing pirate with beam shots to prevent it from attacking.
Let the wall pirate climb down a little bit to make passing it easier.

strats.name: Kill Pirates
note: Kill the pirates to free up the full runway for a speedy jump, or to start an IBJ.
If the wall pirate jumps over a Samus who is not crouched, it will climb offscreen on its own.  But may still need to be killed after.

strats.name: Freeze a Pirate
note: Crouch in front of the standing pirate to freely shoot charge shots.
Shoot upon entering the room to interupt the pirate lazer attack.
Stay far enough away from the wall to avoid the wall pirate.
Jumping can be used to distract the wall pirate, in particular when trying to jump to the overhead platform.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
note: X-Ray climb up the left wall in order to jump to the center platform.
Quickly kill the pirates using ammo before beginning the X-Ray climb.
Climb to just above the door shell and do a turnaround spinjump to reach the platform.

strats.name: Come In Getting Blue Speed, Big Speedy Jump
note: Come in with blue speed, killing the lower two Pirates, with enough momentum to jump all the way up to the door.
devNote: This can also be done with lower run speeds in specific ranges, namely between $2.0 and $2.1 or between $2.E and $3.1, but this would be much more difficult.

strats.name: Come In Getting Blue Speed, Speedy Jump
note: Come in with blue speed, with enough momentum to jump, kill the lower two Pirates, and land on the platform above.
Then either quickly jump through the door before the top Pirate fires its laser, or wait for it to jump to the other side and then jump over it.
devNote: This can also be done with lower run speeds in specific ranges, namely between $2.0 and $2.1 or between $2.E and $3.1, but this would be much more difficult.

strats.name: Come In Getting Blue Speed, Tricky Dash Jump
note: Come in with blue speed, run through the lowest Pirate, continuing with a short jump to kill the one on the right wall.
Next run a specific distance to get speed to jump onto the platform.
Then either quickly jump through the door before the top Pirate fires a laser, or wait for it to jump across the room and then jump over it.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Pirate Dodge Wall Climb)
note: Gain blue speed running into the room, run through the bottom Pirate to kill it, then gain a shinecharge.
Carefully jump around the Pirate above, and wall jump up to the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump Pirate Dodge Wall Climb)
note: Gain blue speed running into the room, run through the bottom Pirate to kill it, then gain a shinecharge.
Carefully jump around the Pirate above, and wall jump up to the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump Screw Wall Climb)
note: Gain blue speed running into the room, run through the bottom Pirate to kill it, then gain a shinecharge.
Use Screw Attack to jump through the Pirate above, and wall jump up to the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump Ledge Grab)
note: Gain blue speed running into the room, run through the bottom Pirate to kill it, then gain a shinecharge.
Run and jump onto the platform above and then up to the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Screw Wall Climb)
note: Gain blue speed running into the room, run through the bottom Pirate to kill it, then gain a shinecharge.
Use Screw Attack to jump through the Pirate above, and wall jump up to the door.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Bottom Position)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Top Position)
Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Shoot at the Standing Pirate to prevent it from attacking.
Then clip through the Power Bomb blocks with a moonfall.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Transition with Stored Fall Speed (more speed)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Transition with Stored Fall Speed (more speed)
Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport
note: The camera will not follow Samus so beams and missiles despawn instantly and the Pirates are inactive.
The Grapple Beam still fully extends and Power Bombs turn the Pirates active.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Carry G-Mode Morph Back Through
strats.devNote: Artificial morph will allow Samus not to fall; real Morph is not sufficient.

strats.name: HiJumpless
devNote: Destroying the obstacle isn't seen to take extra time for two reasons.
1- It destroys the shot blocks as well which are assumed to be manually destroyed each time since they respawn.
2- Some of the time loss of waiting for the PB is offset by having to setup for the jump up anyway.

strats.name: IBJ
note: The shot block may respawn while bomb jumping and can be cleared by weaving a Power Bomb into the IBJ, or with a bomb placed overhead while bomb jumping.
The Power Bomb can be placed one tile higher than the doors to also clear the Power Bomb Blocks above at the same time.
strats.devNote: Placing a power bomb to break the shot block and the power bomb blocks without dropping the IBJ is the same level of control as canBombAboveIBJ.

strats.name: Jump into Respawning Block
note: Run from the right door and jump at the very end of the raised flat ground.
Aim down any time before the peak of the jump in order to not fall out of the block.
Note that Samus can destroy the Power Bomb blocks above while waiting for the block to respawn.

strats.name: 10 Power Bomb Crystal Flash
note: Lay a Power Bomb immediately after killing the Viola, in order to get a Power Bomb drop even if full on Power Bombs.
Jump straight up to collect the drop, then remorph and hold the Crystal Flash inputs.
devNote: Destroying obstacle A from above would kill the Violas prematurely.
FIXME: It is possible to get past their drops from above to still be able to use them; find out if there is a consistent setup for this.

strats.name: Base
note: Falling to the right of the floating platform is faster.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Fall onto the platform, then Wait for the pirate to jump back to the right before returning through the door.
